alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County; Inland Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued January 28 at 5:38AM EST until January 30 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Miami
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EST THIS MORNING... ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE SATURDAY NIGHT THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Dense Fog Advisory, visibility one quarter of a mile or less in dense fog. For the Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 31 possible. * WHERE...Inland Palm Beach and Inland Broward Counties. * WHEN...For the Dense Fog Advisory, until 8 AM EST this morning. For the Freeze Watch, from late Saturday night through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing. If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Inland Broward County; Inland Palm Beach County
